DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate correlation value miRNA relate ARDS vascular endothelial cell ARDS severity , vascular endothelial cell damage degree，mortality patient ARDS .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Correlation Between miRNA Peripheral Blood Prognosis Patients With ARDS
DOC.detailed_description: After consult literature , obtain 14 miRNAs relate ARDS vascular endothelial cell ( ARDS-VEC-miRNAs ) 2 biomarkers scathing vascular endothelial.The ARDS-VEC-miRNAs include miR-15a-5p , miR-16-5p , miR-21-5p , miR-24-3p , miR-26a-5p , miR-27a-3p , miR-27b-3p , miR-126-3p , miR-150-5p , miR-146a-5p , miR-155-5p , miR-221-3p , miR-223-3p , miR-320a.The biomarkers scathing vascular endothelial include vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 ( VCAM-1 ) , von Willebrand factor ( vWF ) .20 healthy control 60 patient diagnose ARDS ICU include study.we blood every participant within 24 hour enrollment obtain plasma.Then , detecte ARDS-VEC-miRNAs , VCAM-1 , vWF level plasma real-time quantitative PCR , record severity illness survival status within 28 day every patients.Finally , evaluate correlation value miRNA relate ARDS vascular endothelial cell ARDS severity , vascular endothelial cell damage degree，mortality patient ARDS .
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) Admitted ICU , ARDS patient ( Berlin criterion ) , ( 2 ) Patients diagnose ARDS within 24 hour , ( 3 ) Patients age 18 year old 85 year . 1 ) Pregnant woman , 2 ) Patients malignant tumor , 3 ) Immunosuppression immunocompromised patient .
